shows.actor: Prem Nazir, Sathyan, Jayabharati, Adoor Bhasi, Bahadur, K.P. Ummer

shows.showDescription: It offers a wide selection of products and a convenient method of shopping.

shows.actor: Priyanshu Chatterjee, Mahima Chaudhry, Vasundhara Das, Jatin Grewal, Pratima Kazmi
shows.showDescription: Hira (Mahima Chaudhury) is a famous movie actress and her fame has gone to her head. She laps up her fans’ adoration and cannot have enough of it. But not before long, things begin to wane and Hira sees her filmy life slipping right before her eyes. While feeling rather sorry for herself, Hira meets Digambar (Priyanshu Chatterjee), a lawyer whom she used to know. He is a total loser who gives her some advice. Watch Hira’s life take a different direction from ...Read Morethen on. But is it for the better?...Hide

shows.actress: Jaime King, Samuel L. Jackson, Madeleine Stack
shows.trivia: The film was originally rated R, but the filmmakers appealed without having to cut or edit any scenes.

shows.actor: Jean Dujardin, Berenice Bejo, John Goodman, James Cromwell, Penelope Ann Miller
shows.awards: Won Oscar Academy Awards in 2012 for Best Director: Michel Hazanavicius, Best Motion Picture of the Year: Thomas Langmann, Best Actor in a Leading Role: Jean Dujardin; Won BAFTA Film Award in 2012 for Best Director: Michel Hazanavicius, Best Film: Thomas Langmann, Best Leading Actor: Jean Dujardin; Won Golden Globe Awards in 2012 for Best Motion Picture: Ludovic Bource
shows.nominatedFor: Oscar Academy Awards in 2012 for Best Art Direction: Laurence Bennett, Robert Gould, Best Actress in a Supporting Role: Berenice Bejo, Best Original Screenplay: Michel Hazanavicius; BAFTA Film Award in 2012 for Best Leading Actress: Berenice Bejo, Best Sound: Nadine Muse, Michael Krikorian, Gerard Lamps; Golden Globe Awards in 2012 for Best Director: Michel Hazanavicius, Best Actress in a Supporting Role:  Berenice Bejo
shows.showDescription: Academy award-winning black-and-white film, which shows how the introduction of talking pictures unsettles the world of silent cinema.
shows.trivia: During filming, Jean Dujardin lived in an isolated 1930s house in the Hollywood Hills.

shows.actor: Jude Law, Ed Harris, Rachel Weisz, Joseph Fiennes, Bob Hoskins
shows.showDescription: In World War II, the USSR depended fully on the strength of Stalingrad. The Russians and Germans fight over every block in the city, leaving ruins behind them. The Russian sniper Vassili Zaitsev (Jude Law) stalks the Germans, taking them out one by one, bringing down the morale of the German troops. Commisar Danilov (Joseph Fiennes) leads him on, making an issue every time Vassili succeeds, thus hoping to raise his countrymen’s hopes. This goes on till Vassili real...Read Moreises that too much is expected of him. Then comes the German master sniper Major Konig (Ed Harris), sent especially to put an end to Vassili. Will he succeed?...Hide
shows.trivia: Unfortunately, in real life, there was no happy reunion for Vassili and Tania: by the battle’s end, each thought the other dead, and Tania learned years later that not only was her lover still alive, but had recently married.

shows.actor: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey, Mitch Ryan, Tom Atkins
shows.showDescription: Martin (Mel Gibson) is a Los Angeles policeman who has suicidal tendencies. Roger (Danny Glover) is assigned as his partner. Together, the two men uncover a huge drug-smuggling operation. Their friendship grows along with their success.
shows.trivia: Franco Zeffirelli reportedly decided to offer Mel Gibson the role of Hamlet after seeing his suicide contemplation scene in this film.

shows.actor: Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson, Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon
shows.alsoKnownAs: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire: The IMAX Experience (USA)
shows.showDescription: Harry Potter (Daniel Radcliffe), his friends Ron Weasley (Rupert Grint) and Hermione Granger (Emma Watson) return to the Hogwarts School of Magic for their fourth year. This year the Triwizard Tournament is to be held at Hogwarts. Only students above the age of 17 can enter the tournament. But someone has entered Harry’s name for it. Will he survive the dangers that are to be faced during the event?
shows.showTitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
shows.trivia: As in the second film, full-size models were used in scenes which required teen actors to keep completely still for a lengthy period of time.

shows.actor: Dwayne Johnson, Carla Gugino, Alexandra Daddario, Ioan Gruffudd, Archie Panjabi, Paul Giamatti
shows.showDescription: After the infamous San Andreas Fault finally gives, triggering a massive magnitude 9 earthquake in California, a search and rescue helicopter pilot (Dwayne Johnson) and his estranged wife make their way together from Los Angeles to San Francisco to save their only daughter. But their treacherous journey north is only the beginning. And when they think the worst may be over...it’s just getting started.
shows.trivia: Alexandra Daddario has only a 14 year age difference with Dwayne Johnson who plays her father, and 15 with Carla Gugino who plays her mother.
shows.writer: Carlton Cuse, Andre Fabrizio, Jeremy Passmore

shows.actor: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon
shows.alsoKnownAs: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 3D
shows.awards: BAFTA Film Award in 2012 for Best Special Visual Effects: John Richardson, David Vickery, Tim Burke, Greg Butler
shows.nominatedFor: Oscar Academy Awards in 2012 for Best Art Direction: Stuart Craig and Stephenie McMillan, Best Visual Effects: Tim Burke, David Vickery, Greg Butler and John Richardson; BAFTA Film Award in 2012 for Best Make Up & Hair: Amanda Knight, Lisa Tomblin, Best Production Design: Stephenie McMillan, Stuart Craig, Best Sound: Mike Dowson, Adam Scrivener, James Mather
shows.producer: David Barron, David Heyman, J.K. Rowling
shows.showDescription: The film revolves with final chapter begins as Harry, Ron, and Hermione continue their quest of finding and destroying the Dark Lord’s three remaining Horcruxes, the magical items responsible for his immortality. But as the mystical Deathly Hallows are uncovered, and Voldemort finds out about their mission, the biggest battle begins and life as they know it will never be the same again.
shows.showTitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
shows.trivia: Molly Weasley’s line "Not my daughter you bitch!" is Julie Walters’ favorite line throughout her career.

shows.actor: Lou Ferrigno, Sybil Danning, Brad Harris, Ingrid Anderson, William Berger
shows.showDescription: Hercules faces the task of trying to rescue a princess from the clutches of her villainous kidnappers, who make their home on the moon.

shows.actor: Ed Skrein, Ray Stevenson, Loan Chabanol, Gabriella Wright, Tatjana Pajkovic
shows.trivia: Jason Statham declined to play Frank Martin again.
shows.writer: Adam Cooper, Bill Collage, Luc Besson

shows.actor: Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, John Turturro, Ramon Rodriguez, Josh Duhamel
shows.producer: Ian Bryce, Tom DeSanto, Don Murphy
shows.showDescription: Sam Witwicky is heading off to college 3000 miles away from his girlfriend MacKayla (Megan Fox), his overprotective and emotional mother, and his anxious father.The week Sam Witwicky starts college, the Decepticons make trouble in Shanghai. A presidential envoy believes the Autobots are responsible, he wants them gone. He’s wrong: the Decepticons are out in search of Sam, they need access to Sam’s mind to see some glyphs imprinted there that will lead them to...Read More a fragile object, which, once inserted in an alien machine hidden in Egypt for centuries, will give them access to a powerful energy source enabling them to destroy the earths sun. Sam, his girlfriend MacKayla, and Sam’s parents are in danger. Optimus Prime and Bumblebee are Sam’s principal protectors. If one of them goes down, what becomes of Sam?...Hide
shows.trivia: The Decepticon Alice is classified as a Pretender, a robot that maintains a bio-organic shell.

shows.actor: Robert Downey Jr., Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges, Gwyneth Paltrow, Leslie Bibb
shows.nominatedFor: Oscar Award in 2008 for Best Sound Editing: Frank E. Eulner, Christopher Boyes; Best Visual Effects: John Nelson, Ben Snow, Daniel Sudick, Shane Mahan; BAFTA Film Award in 2009 for Best Special Visual Effects: Hal T. Hickel, Shane Mahan, John Nelson, Ben Snow
shows.showDescription: Tony Stark (Robert Downey Jr) is a playboy cum engineering genius. He goes to Afghanistan to demonstrate a new missile and is captured and wounded there. His captors insist that he assemble a new missile for them. But Tony creates an armoured suit and uses it to make his escape. On returning home to the USA, he makes an announcement that his company will stop manufacturing weapons. He begins work on an updated armoured suit when he finds out that his second-in-command, O...Read Morebadiah Stane (Jeff Bridges), has been selling the company weapons to the insurgents. Watch Tony use his new suit to destroy the arms sold and stop Stane from misusing his research....Hide
shows.trivia: During pre-production, Robert Downey Jr. set up an office next to Jon Favreau’s office, to discuss his role with Favreau and to be more involved in the film’s screenwriting.
shows.writer: Mark Fergus, Hawk Ostby, Art Marcum

shows.actor: Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Rosamund Pike, Ralph Fiennes, Toby Kebbell
shows.showDescription: Perseus and his son Helius live as fishermen in a small village. One night, Zeus visits Perseus and tells that the gods are weaker since the humans do not pray to them anymore. He tells that the walls of Tartarus are falling down in the underworld and all the demons will be released on Earth and Kronos will escape from his imprisonment. Zeus goes to the underworld with Poseidon to join forces with Aries and Hades but they are betrayed and Zeus is captured. Poseidon escap...Read Morees deadly wounded and encounters Perseus in the Zeus’ Temple. He gives his trident to Perseus and advises him to meet his son and also demigod Agenor in the kingdom of Andromeda and ask him to guide Perseus to find the fallen one. Together with Andromeda, they begin their saga to release Zeus and avoid that Ares and Hades unleash the ancient Titan Kronos....Hide
shows.trivia: Javier Bardem was considered for the role of Ares, and James Franco was considered to play Agenor. Ultimately Edgar Ramirez and Toby Kebbell were cast.

shows.producer: Beau Flynn, Barry Levine, Brett Ratner
shows.showDescription: The ensemble action film revolves around Hercules (Dwayne Johnson) who has become a mercenary due to the sins from his past. Along with five faithful companions, he travels ancient Greece selling his services for gold and using his legendary reputation to intimidate enemies. But when the compassionate ruler of Thrace and his daughter seek Hercules’ help to defeat a savage and terrifying warlord, Hercules finds that in order for good to triumph and justice to prevai...Read Morel, he must once again become the hero he was and embrace his own myth. Witness the adventure, fantasy and action like never before in ‘Hercules’....Hide
shows.trivia: According to Greek mythology Autolycus is Odysseus’ grandfather.

shows.actor: Ramesh Aravind, Akshay Anand, Hema
shows.showDescription: Surya (Ramesh Aravind), Shashank (Akshay Anand) and Bhoomi (Hema) are friends who are at the same college. After completing their graduation, Surya sets up his own business in their hometown. Shashank goes to America for further studies and Bhoomi stays back at home, learning housekeeping. After three years, Shashank returns home. He begins to badmouth India the moment he steps out of the airport and cannot stop raving about America. His family arranges his marriage with...Read More Bhoomi. No one is aware that Surya is in love with Bhoomi and is desperate to tell her. Watch the film to see who will get Bhoomi ? Shashank or Surya?...Hide
shows.trivia: It is the debut movie of music director Mano Murthy.

shows.actor: Sunny Deol, Dimple Kapadia, Shakti Kapoor, Prem Chopra, Om Shivpuri
shows.showDescription: Young Shankar gets arrested for the crime he hasn’t committed. His mother dies from the shock of his son being arrested. He escapes from the prison and start working for Raja Babu, who is a criminal don. Shankar changes to Shaka. One day he is asked to abduct a child. He follows the order, but when the child’s mother dies of his son’s shock, Shankar feels guilty and surrenders himself to the police. He is sentenced to five year’s of prison. But, w...Read Morehen he saves the life of a Member of Parliament who has visited their prison, his sentence is lessened to two years and he is released soon. After coming out of the jail, he decides to leave the path of crime. He marries a woman named Aarti and begins his new life as a mechanic. Will his past life let him live happily?...Hide

shows.actor: Sharad S. Kapoor, Amit Khaladkar, Rajit Kapoor, Usha Bachani, Mahima Mehta
shows.showDescription: Monalisa (Mahima Mehta) has led a life full of hardships. She is the only child of her parents. Her father had suffered a paralytic stroke and has been confined to the wheelchair since Monalisa had been six years old. She also undergoes trauma when her boyfriend ditches her. Monalisa joins a music class that is taught by Jay (Amit Khaladkar). The two of them fall in love. Her parents approve and they get engaged. Little do they know that Jay is wanted by the police for t...Read Morehe murder of three men....Hide

shows.actor: Tabu, Chandrachur Singh, Om Puri, Jimmy Shergill, Kanwaljit Singh
shows.awards: Won National Film Award (Silver Lotus Award) in 1997 for Best Actress: Tabu
shows.showDescription: The Sikh community is terrorised post the assassination of Prime Minister Indira Gandhi. This drove many of the youngsters to join extremists without understanding the consequences. When Veerandra’s (Tabu) brother Jassi (Raj Zutshi) is arrested, the family do not see him for days. But he returns, bleeding and wounded terribly as he had been tortured by the police. Kripal Singh (Chandrachur Singh) who has a soft corner for Veerandra, swears to take revenge and joins...Read More the extremists Commander (Kulbhushan Kharbanda) and Sanataan (Om Puri). What are the chances of his survival?...Hide

shows.actor: Salman Khan, Sneha Ullal, Mithun Chakraborty, Kader Khan, Navni Parihar
shows.nominatedFor: Filmfare Award in 2006 for Best Music: Adnan Sami.
shows.producer: Sohail Khan, Bhushan Kumar, Krishan Kumar
shows.showDescription: Adithya (Salman Khan) plays the son of the Indian Ambassador in an Eastern European Country. There, he meets a pretty 17-year-old girl called Lucky (Sneha Ullal), who is mesmerized by Adithya’s charisma.Will their love  be acceptable?
shows.trivia: Sneha Ullal’s parents let her go to Russia only because they knew she was in good hands with Salman Khan.

shows.actor: Sahil Khan, Tanushree Dutta, Dalip Singh Rana, Ishita Panchal
shows.showDescription: The film follows the story of six kids – Rohan, Riddhi, Kunal, Komal, Sameer and Sanjh. They enter a dance competition that ends in a tie. They share the prize – a video game that has been newly launched. Watch their adventures unfold when all six of them are sucked into the game and find themselves on an island where Ramaa (Sahil Khan) lives. Will they ever be able to get back to the real world?

shows.actor: Vinod Khanna, Ajay Devgan, Kajol, Ronit Roy, Kader Khan
shows.showDescription: ACP Siddarth (Vinod Khanna) has been assigned the tough job of arresting gangster Shobhraj’s (Amrish Puri) son. Shobhraj does his best to bring political pressure on Siddarth but to no avail. Siddarth has two sons - Deva (Ajay Devgan) is adopted and Karan (Ronit Roy) is his own blood. Watch the film to see how Siddarth and Deva handle the situation when Karan is framed for murder and if proven guilty will have to face the electric chair.
shows.trivia: Upon the initial meeting of Ajay Devgan and Kajol, Kajol was angry at the Producer for bringing an actor like Ajay and not an actor like

shows.actor: Akshay Kumar, Bobby Deol, Kareena Kapoor, Bipasha Basu, Johnny Lever
shows.awards: Won Filmfare Award in 2002 for Best Villain/Villainess - Akshay Kumar
shows.nominatedFor: Filmfare Award in 2002 for Best Comedian/Comedienne: Johnny Lever, Best Playback Singer - Male: Adnan Sami
shows.showDescription: Raj (Bobby Deol) and Priya (Kareena Kapoor) meet quite by chance, fall in love and get married. They move to Switzerland when Raj gets a job there and settle down. Vicky (Akshay Kumar) and his wife Sonia (Bipasha Basu) are their closest neighbours and they become quite friendly. Priya likes their rich and frivolous lifestyle and they go on holidays together. But one night, the two men get drunk and Raj passes out. He wakes up the next morning and finds himself lying on V...Read Moreicky’s bed with Sonia’s dead body beside him. What happens when he is arrested for murder?...Hide
shows.trivia: The film is adapted from the 1992 American thriller film Consenting Adults, directed by Alan J. Pakula.

shows.actor: Gopichand, Taapsee Pannu, Shakti Kapoor, Suman, Ali
shows.showDescription: The Real Jackpot is a Hindi thriller starring Gopichand and Taapsee Pannu, and is directed by Chandra Sekhar Yeleti. It is the Hindi dub of the the Telugu hit Sahasam. The past mingles with the present in this colourful and exciting pre-independence era treasure hunt. Gautam Varma, a security guard, hunts for the priceless diamonds that his grandfather was said to have hidden in the Hinglaj temple.

shows.actor: NTR Jr., Nayantara, Sheela, Mahesh Manjrekar
shows.showDescription: The story is about two twin brothers who get separated at birth. Narasimha (NTR) gets raised by a single mother and he becomes an undercover agent to a top cop. Chari (NTR) is brought up by a family of traditional Hindu priests. A gang of baddies (Asish Vidyardhi and Mahesh Manjrekar) are in search of the family of a top scientist. The rest of the story is about the relationship between the scientist and the twins and the comedy generated by switching between the charact...Read Moreers....Hide

India’s biggest sporting extravaganza is back! The tenth edition of the Indian premier League will see 8 teams collides for the title. This season history will be in making, new faces will be seen in the Teams. while champion Hyderabad will be gearing up to defend their title, the other 9 teams will all be out there to prove a point. So, pick up your jersey and start cheering for your team!...
shows.showTitle: Indian Premier League 2017 : Mumbai vs. Bangalore

shows.showDescription: India’s biggest sporting extravaganza is back! The tenth edition of the Indian premier League will see 8 teams collides for the title. This season history will be in making, new faces will be seen in the Teams. while champion Hyderabad will be gearing up to defend their title, the other 9 teams will all be out there to prove a point. So, pick up your jersey and start cheering for your team!...
shows.showTitle: Indian Premier League 2017 : Pune vs. Gujarat

shows.actor: Colin Firth, Samuel L. Jackson, Mark Strong, Taron Egerton, Michael Caine, Sophie Cookson
shows.producer: Adam Bohling, David Reid, Matthew Vaughn
shows.showDescription: Kingsman: The Secret Service is based on an acclaimed comic book The Secret Service by Mark Millar and Dave Gibbons. This films tells a story of a man named Gary Unwin, a street kid living in South London. When an agent from spy organization recognizes potential in the youth and hires him as a trainee for a secret service mission, they have to stop a global threat to change the climate problem, but via worldwide killing spree.
shows.trivia: All the action is framed centrally, your eyes need never leave the centre of the frame.

shows.actor: Susan Ward, Katie Stuart, Leila Arcieri, Isaiah Washington, Linden Ashby
shows.followedBy: Wild Things: Diamonds in the Rough
shows.showDescription: Brittany (Susan Ward) is the stepdaughter of billionaire Niles Dunlap (Tony Denison), a very powerful and wealthy member of Blue Bay community of Florida. Her life is torn apart when Niles is killed in a plane crash. And things take a turn for the worse when Maya King (Leila Arcieri) claims to be Niles daughter and sets out to take over the inheritance from Brittany. Terrance (Isaiah Washington), the insurance investigator suspects that things are not quite what they see...Read Morem to be. Could he be right?...Hide

shows.actor: Sacha Baron Cohen, Ben Kingsley, Anna Faris, Sayed Badreya, Rocky Citron
shows.producer: Sacha Baron Cohen, Alec Berg, Anthony Hines
shows.showDescription: Hafez Aladeen, an eccentric and repressive leader rules the Republic of Wadiya. His trip goes off beam when he is summoned to New York to a UN assembly to address concerns about his country’s nuclear weapons program.
shows.trivia: The photos of Aladeen’s other financially procured lovers in addition to Megan Fox include Lindsay Lohan, Halle Berry, Oprah Winfrey, and Arnold Schwarzenegger.
shows.writer: Sacha Baron Cohen, Alec Berg, David Mandel

shows.actor: Jim Carrey, Virginia Madsen, Logan Lerman, Danny Huston, Mark Pellegrino
shows.showDescription: Walter (Jim Carrey) is married to Agatha (Virginia Madsen) and they teenage son is Robin (Logan Lerman). Walter works in the Department of Animal Control as a dogcatcher. He gets bitten by a dog on his birthday and goes late to meet Agatha. While waiting for him in a bookstore, Agatha buys a mystery novel as a gift for Walter. He reads the mystery that surrounds number 23 and is fascinated with the incidents that are described in it. He finds them very similar to those i...Read Moren his own life. That’s when Walter goes in search of the author. Further investigation leaves him paranoid. How has number 23 affected Walter’s own life?...Hide
shows.trivia: When we first see the book "The Number 23" in the bookshop where Agatha buys it, the book is on the shelf facing out, not tucked in between any books. Because of this, 23 books are visible on the shelf behind it.

shows.actor: Henry Cavill, Veronica Echegui, Bruce Willis, Sigourney Weaver, Joseph Mawle, Caroline Goodall
shows.showDescription: A young businessman must save his family from kidnappers but his task is fraught with obstacles!
shows.trivia: When Henry Cavill turned up on set, he had just finished shooting Immortals and came sporting an extremely muscular and ultra-ripped physique. Director Mabrouk El Mechri told him that he had to play an ordinary man and that his current body would be completely wrong for the character. Henry Cavill had to lose all the muscle tone and mass that he gained over the previous six months to get his body to look like that of an average man. He did it by eating and drinking a lot and not working out.

shows.actor: Jason James Richter, August Schellenberg, Annie Corley, Patrick Kilpatrick, Tasha Simms
shows.showDescription: In the third installment in the Free Willy series, Jesse (Jason James Richter), the once-troubled youth whose life was changed by his friendship with the killer whale Willy, is spending the summer on board a ship assisting a group a whale researchers, including his old friend Randolph (August Schellenberg), and Drew (Annie Corley), an oceanographer. Jesse once used a harmonica to communicate with Willy, and when he plays his mouth harp through the ship’s underwater...Read More sound system, he is able to find his old friend, who is now raising a family of his own. As Jesse, Randolph, and Drew are out to study and assist the whales, a ten-year-old boy named Max (Vincent Berry) is accompanying his father John Wesley (Patrick Kilpatrick) on the fishing boat that John helps to run. Max soon discovers that John and the crew are not fishing for salmon, as he believed, but killer whales, which is illegal, but very profitable, as whale meat fetches $200 a pound on the black market. Jesse meets Max on shore, and when Jesse learns what John and his crew are up to, he tries to teach Max that while his father may not be a bad man, he’s doing a very bad thing in killing the whales, who are intelligent, compassionate, and deserve the right to live; Jesse also acts to save Willy and his family from John and his fellow poachers. As in Free Willy 2: The Adventure Home, Free Willy 3: The Rescue used mechanical and animated whales rather than flesh-and-blood aquatic mammals. -...Hide
shows.trivia: The film is the second sequel to the 1993 film Free Willy, the first being the 1995 film Free Willy 2: The Adventure Home.

shows.showDescription: John Matthews estranged son Jason, is set by his friend in a sting operation for distribution of narcotics. Jason’s charges carry a minimum of 10 years in prison. John feels responsible for this and decide to act as an informant in return for the release of his son. He comes to Daniel James his employee who had connection with the drug dealer. He request Daniel to introduce him to a dealer. Now Daniel doesn’t want to get involve as he has a wife and young son...Read More to care for. So watch as how a father risk his life to save his son from prison......Hide

shows.actor: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving, Joe Pantoliano
shows.awards: Won Oscar Awards in 2000 for Best Effects: John Gaeta, Janek Sirrs, Steve Courtley, Jon Thum; BAFTA Awards in 2000 for Best Visual Effects: John Gaeta, Steve Courtley, Janek Sirrs, Jon Thum
shows.producer: Joel Silver, Larry Wachowski, Andy Wachowski
shows.showDescription: Keanu Reeves stars in this sci-fi blockbuster as Thomas A. Anderson, an average computer programmer. He has an alter-ego by night as Neo, a malevolent hacker. The real story begins when Neo begins to question his reality; as he digs deeper, the truth is far more than he could imagine. The world is now captured by an army of machines that imprison human minds within an artificial reality called the Matrix. Neo has to fight the machines and determine what’s real and ...Read Morewhat’s not....Hide
shows.trivia: The scene in which Neo meets the gifted children in the Oracle’s apartment is an homage to the similar scene at the end of Akira (1988).

shows.actor: Jackie Chan, Chris Tucker, John Lone, Zhang Ziyi, Roselyn Sanchez
shows.musicDirector: Lalo Schifrin, Nile Rodgers, Ira Hearshen
shows.producer: Robert Birnbaum, Jonathan Glickman, Athur M. Sarkissian
shows.showDescription: Chief Inspector Lee and Detective James Carter are back! But this time they’re now in Hong Kong on a vacation. However, soon after they arrive, a bomb explodes in the American Embassy. And Inspector Lee is assigned to the case, which becomes personal when it is discovered that the man behind it is Ricky Tan, Lee’s father’s former partner. Tan, who played an instrumental role in his father’s death, who is now the leader of the Triads, the most dead...Read Morely gang in all of China. The American and Hong Kong authorities soon get into a fight over the jurisdiction of the case. Lee learns that Ricky Tan will be attending a dinner party on his boat. When confronted, Tan claims that someone is trying to frame him. Tan’s underling, Hu Li, appears and shoots Tan, and he falls off the boat. In the chaos, Hu Li escapes into a sewer come emerge in downtown Las Vegas, but Carter and Lee are forced to be sent back to Los Angeles. But later in Las Vegas, at the Red Dragon Casino, Lee has been framed when Ricky Tan faked his death and is now still alive but Hu Li places a small bomb in his mouth, and gags him. But will Carter save him while he’s still makes a big commotion and distracts the security forces?...Hide
shows.trivia: The movie premiered on 26 July 2001 on a single Los Angeles to Hong Kong flight by United Airlines and the Hong Kong Tourism Board.

shows.showDescription: It’s the time of the mainland’s take over of Hong Kong  and Ma Jun is a cop who is known as a man who metes out justice during arrests. He along with Hua Sheng are trying to bring down three ruthless Vietnamese brothers who are running a smuggling ring. They face numerous trials while bringing down the gang and a final showdown is bound to happen.
shows.trivia: Due to the intensity and complexity of the sequence, both Donnie Yen and Collin Chou agreed that their fight sequence at the end of the film was the hardest shoot they had ever done in their respective careers

Holly and other police appreciates Bruce for his assistance. Bruce thinks of settling down on this island until more strangers comes looking after him. Simultaneously a beheaded body is discovered in an island & on the side  Bruce goes hiding which suggest that he is a killer.The new arrivals reveal themselves to be none other th...Read Morean colleagues of the victim. Holly’ is horrified when she knows the truth of the victim beign a ruthless criminal. Will Holly overcome her feelings for Bruce and fight for what she has been appointed?...Hide

shows.actor: Briana Evigan, Robert Hoffman, Adam G. Sevani, Cassie Ventura, Will Kemp
shows.producer: Erik Feig, Jennifer Gibgot, Adam Shankman
shows.showDescription: A follow-up to 2006’s smash Step Up, this sequel centers on Andie (Evigan), a rebellious street dancer who lands a spot at the elite Maryland School of the Arts. Her freestyle moves are at odds with the school’s conservative curriculum but she finds a kindred spirit in Chase (Hoffman, She’s the Man), the school’s hottest dancer. Together, the pair recruits fellow classmates to form their own crew to compete in an underground street-dancing contest...Read More. In the final showdown, she must find a way to live her dream and build a bridge between her two worlds....Hide
shows.trivia: To prepare for the role of Chase Collins, Robert Hoffman actually went into the Baltimore city underground dance scene and participated in competitive break dance circles.

shows.actor: Jodie Foster, Kristen Stewart, Forest Whitaker, Jared Leto, Patrick Bauchau
shows.producer: Cean Chaffin, Judy Hofflund, David Koepp, Gavin Polone
shows.showDescription: Meg Altman (Jodie Foster) gets a divorce and takes her daughter Sarah (Kristen Stewart) to live in their recently purchased home in New York. The two of them take a tour of the mansion to find out that there is a panic room – it’s so secure that no one can get in. Three burglars break into their home and Meg moves into the panic room along with Sarah. But there is one major problem. The burglars need to steal something from that particular room and are not ready ...Read Moreto leave without what they came for. How safe are Meg and her daughter?...Hide
shows.trivia: Jodie Foster was pregnant with her second child during filming. Because of this, reshoots had to be made in the autumn of 2001 after she had given birth, as principal photography took longer than planned.

shows.actor: Danny Trejo, Steven Seagal, Michelle Rodriguez, Jeff Fahey, Cheech Marin, Lindsay Lohan
shows.producer: Elizabeth Avellan, Robert Rodriguez, Rick Schwartz
shows.showDescription: The highly skilled federale Machete (Trejo) is hired by some unsavory types to assassinate a senator. But just as he’s about to take the shot, he notices someone aiming at him and realizes he’s been set up. He barely survives the sniper’s bullet, and is soon out for revenge on his former employers, with the reluctant assistance of his old friend Padre (Marin), who has become a priest and taken a vow of nonviolence, and a few other allies.
shows.trivia: Robert Rodriguez wrote the script back in 1993 after he wrote Desperado.

The magic happens and they start seeing each other and they get bolder with passing time. Her father is a kingpin in local politics who comes to know about their love and will leave no stone uptur...Read Morened to bring an end to it.
